alert.note: Alert for Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 8:22PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cape May County through 900 PM EDT... At 822 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near West Cape May, or near Cape May, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape May, North Wildwood, Wildwood Crest, Avalon, West Cape May, Stone Harbor, Cape May Court House, Scotch Bonnet, Diamond Beach, Green Creek, Rio Grande, North Cape May, Villas, West Wildwood, Erma and Whitesboro-Burleigh. This includes Garden State Parkway between mile markers 0 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May
